data.text:
A Christian Non-Government Organization majorly dealing in evangelism, holistic and transformational development work in Uganda, is seeking to recruit dynamic and dedicated individuals to fill the following Vacancies in their Ugandan office.

EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR:

This is a top managerial position reporting directly to the Board of Directors and responsible for the Missions Manager, Finance and Administration Manager and Programmes manager

Overall Responsibility:

To provide overall leadership, direction, management of the organization’s strategic agenda and its resources and ensure that the organization is, in a viable manner, running effective programmes and providing services in line with the strategy and position of the Governing Board.

Key job performance areas:

Strategic team level leadership and organization

Responsible for the organizations finances i.e. overseeing the acquisition and expenditure of the organization’s resources.

Lead the organization’s human resource function

Fundraising and networking

Supporting the senior managers in reviewing policies and strategies

Plan and set strategic goals and targets for units under the ED’s jurisdiction in line with the organizations strategy.

Timely delivery of key management, financial and programme reports

Spiritual leadership of the organisation

How to apply:

Apply in own handwriting with a detailed C.V, Copies of academic documents, Testimonials, Details of 3 referees and their telephone contacts to;

The Human Resource Manager

Exodus Kampala Certified Public Accountants, Suite 5.2, 2nd floor Uganda House P. O. Box 21028, Kampala

Applications should be submitted not later than Monday, 26th of November 2012.
